participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring, dedicated, and loves to help others. Enjoys singing and has a passion for Disney movies.
participant_1.background: I have blonde hair and blue eyes. I work at a bar at night to pay for college. I recently got an apartment with my best friend. I am in college to become a nurse. I do not like chicken.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Playful, imaginative, and loves to sing. Enjoys spending time with friends and going to Disney World.
participant_2.background: I play with my friends on the playground. I love to sing songs from the movie Frozen. Mickey Mouse is my favorite character. I love to go to Disney World every year. I am in the third grade.

content.text: Hi, what's your name?
My name is participant_2.
It's nice to meet you, participant_1. What grade are you in?
I'm in the third grade.
That's great! I'm in college.
That's cool! What are you studying?
I'm studying to become a nurse.
That's a great job! I want to be a singer when I grow up.
That's a great goal! I love to sing too.
Do you like to sing Frozen songs?
Yes, I love to sing Frozen songs!
Me too! I love to sing "Let it Go."
Me too! It's such a great song.
What's your favorite Disney movie?
My favorite Disney movie is Mulan.
That's a great movie! I love the songs in that movie.
Me too! I love the song "Reflection."
That's a great song! I love to sing it.
Me too! I love singing Disney songs.
Me too! I love to sing them with my friends.
